title: Messenger – Text and Video Chat for Free
description:
Be together whenever, with our free* all-in-one communication app, complete with unlimited text, voice, video calling and group video chat features. Easily sync your messages and contacts to your Android phone and connect with anyone, anywhere. 
 
FREE VIDEO CALLS TO STAY CONNECTED
Keep your friends and family close with unlimited live video chatting - like facetime, but works across devices (Android, iOS, etc.). Host group video calls with up to 8 people, with high-quality audio, high definition video, and interactive video features like face filters.  
 
UNLIMITED FREE TEXT & PHONE CALLS 
Skip exchanging phone numbers and simply send a message to your Facebook friends, even if they’re across the world.  Enjoy high-quality voice and text messaging on mobile, tablet, and desktop. 
 
RECORD AND SEND VOICE AND VIDEO MESSAGES
When text just won't cut it, just hit record and send. Say, sing, show, or shout it out loud.
 
TURN OFF THE LIGHTS IN DARK MODE 
Give your eyes some rest with a sleek new look that darkens the colors of the chat interface. 
 
EXPRESS YOURSELF WITH STICKERS, GIFS, AND EMOJIS 
Use custom stickers to show your creative side. You can even add effects and filters to video calls.
 
SEND FILES, PHOTOS, AND VIDEOS 
There’s no limit to the number of files you want to share with your friends.
 
SEND MONEY SECURELY AND EASILY (within US only)
Send and receive money from friends in the app by adding your debit card or PayPal account.
 
SHARE YOUR LOCATION
Suggest a meeting spot or tell friends where you are by sharing your location with just a few taps.
 
CHAT WITH BUSINESSES
Easily connect with your favorite businesses to make reservations, get customer support, find deals and more.
 
BRING SMS INTO MESSENGER
No need to open multiple apps to stay in touch. Use one app for SMS and Messenger. 

COMPATABLE ACROSS PLATFORMS 
Chat with friends across an array of devices, like desktop, Portal, and iOS.
 
Privacy Policy: https://www.facebook.com/about/privacy/ 
LEARN MORE about Messenger texting and group video chat at: http://messenger.com (http://messenger.com/)   

* Data rates apply

summary: Free group video chat, video calls, voice calls and text messaging.
recentChanges: We update the app regularly so that we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Messenger features. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using Messenger!
comments: Since a couple of weeks the direct share link on a Samsung Galaxy S10 does not work any more. It does not get you the option to choose which people to send to. It the application was opened, it basically takes you too it, but if not, absolutely nothing happens. Direct share works with other apps, though!

What's wrong whith this app?! Messages can't be sent on my screen, while others see my messages and it doesn't showing me that. My messages are sent but not delivered or seen. And my chat list isn't loading. It happens to me every day and resetting end reinstalling isn't working. Fix this Facebook. It's annoying. 🙄 It started 3-4 weeks ago.

Text works great. But when I call people it seems like the voice and video calls don't always work here in Cleburne TX. When I call people on the other side of the world it works fine but here in my town the calls don't always go through or get dropped or bad quality. Maybe the internet availability needs improvement in my town.

Messenger recent update is bugged and I have tested it already on all 3 devices of mine, both android and iOS. Whenever I am trying to share something through messenger (be it a YouTube video, a photo, or an audio clip I have recorded in my phone's internal app), it will only pull up the Messenger app as if I am not sharing anything!!

messenger sucks anymore.....have not been able to share and send articles to my friends as I did before, by clicking on share, then messenger and then name used to come up and I would click send next to their name, but will not and has not done for three going on four days today and do not know why! Is there something wrong with messenger? Can you please fix this problem and asap, thanks!

title: WhatsApp Messenger
description:
WhatsApp from Facebook

WhatsApp Messenger is a FREE messaging app available for Android and other smartphones. WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family. Switch from SMS to WhatsApp to send and receive messages, calls, photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

WHY USE WHATSAPP:

• NO FEES: WhatsApp uses your phone's Internet connection (4G/3G/2G/EDGE or Wi-Fi, as available) to let you message and call friends and family, so you don't have to pay for every message or call.* There are no subscription fees to use WhatsApp.

• MULTIMEDIA: Send and receive photos, videos, documents, and Voice Messages.

• FREE CALLS: Call your friends and family for free with WhatsApp Calling, even if they're in another country.* WhatsApp calls use your phone's Internet connection rather than your cellular plan's voice minutes. (Note: Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details. Also, you can't access 911 and other emergency service numbers through WhatsApp).

• GROUP CHAT: Enjoy group chats with your contacts so you can easily stay in touch with your friends or family.

• WHATSAPP WEB: You can also send and receive WhatsApp messages right from your computer's browser.

• NO INTERNATIONAL CHARGES: There's no extra charge to send WhatsApp messages internationally. Chat with your friends around the world and avoid international SMS charges.*

• SAY NO TO USERNAMES AND PINS: Why bother having to remember yet another username or PIN? WhatsApp works with your phone number, just like SMS, and integrates seamlessly with your phone's existing address book.

• ALWAYS LOGGED IN: With WhatsApp, you're always logged in so you don't miss messages. No more confusion about whether you're logged in or logged out.

• QUICKLY CONNECT WITH YOUR CONTACTS: Your address book is used to quickly and easily connect you with your contacts who have WhatsApp so there's no need to add hard-to-remember usernames.

• OFFLINE MESSAGES: Even if you miss your notifications or turn off your phone, WhatsApp will save your recent messages until the next time you use the app.

• AND MUCH MORE: Share your location, exchange contacts, set custom wallpapers and notification sounds, broadcast messages to multiple contacts at once, and more!

*Data charges may apply. Contact your provider for details.

--------------------------------------------------------- 
We're always excited to hear from you! If you have any feedback, questions, or concerns, please email us at:

android-support@whatsapp.com

or follow us on twitter:

http://twitter.com/WhatsApp
@WhatsApp
---------------------------------------------------------

summary: Simple. Personal. Secure.
recentChanges: - Dark mode is now available. Try it by going to Settings > Chats > Theme > select ‘Dark’. For users on Android 10, dark mode is enabled automatically when you turn it on in system settings.
comments: Very useful app. But still there is a security issue. Because, anyone who is an admin of any group, can add any number without their permission. Instead I have a suggestion that, if a group admin needs to add a number to that group, then the owner of that number should receive a message to opt "YES I am interested to join" or " NO I am not interested to join". This will ensure more individual security. Hope you will update the changes. Thank you.

Not the best instant messaging app but the most popular, which pretty much forces one to use it, and it's decent, especially now that it has a dark mode, save for the fact that we still can't edit messages to fix mistakes, or that we can't select messages and press the text bar to quote them like before, not even as an option. Two things to be added that'd greatly improve the app.

Since the 20/03/2020 update I can no longer open whatsapp. It crashes every time. I can only access it if someone sends me a message and I click on the notification. I have been using this app for years and this is the first major problem I have encountered. I have cleared cache and even reinstalled a number of times without any success. I'm using a huawei P30. Please fix this issue/bug, i use this app every day to keep in contact with friends and family. I have notified support but no help

This app is very useful for me. It keeps my work sorted and I can also stay connected with my loved ones easily. It also helps in my business. A lots of pictures I can share with my clients easily. Easy conversation. Calls quality is good Video call feature is also nice. Overall this is very useful application for anyone and easy to use....

Before the start of 2020 WhatsApp was the best social App ever created. However, since the start of the year, I'm not sure what changed but it went from a 10 star to a 1 star. Video calls are poor and voice calls are worse. You talk for a few minutes then the person on the other cannot hear you. At 1st I thought it was temporary but this has being going on steady for months.

title: Messenger Kids – The Messaging App for Kids
description:
Made for Kids. Controlled by Parents.
 
Parent Dashboard:
Parents can manage their kids' contact list, and monitor messages on the Messenger Kids app. When kids block contacts, parents are notified.

Fun Filters:
Kid-friendly filters, reactions, and sound effects make video chats with friends and family even better. 

Worry Free:
Parents can set usage limits when it’s bedtime, and there are no in app-purchases or ads.

Creative Convos:
Stickers, GIFs, emojis, and drawing tools give kids more ways to express themselves.

Easy Start:
No phone number required.

We’re always working to improve Messenger Kids. If you’d like to share any feedback with us or for more information, visit messengerkids.com.

summary: Fun, free app that lets kids video call and message family and close friends.
comments: Great idea needs work. While in the app it lists some of my kids contacts but not all of them. It also does not open chat heads or give any kind of notification when someone sends a message while you aren't on you don't know I have multiple kids so as a parent it's frustrating trying to manage their accounts. If I manage one it signs me into theirs as them and then won't let me sign out to check on another ones account. I had to uninstall and reinstall. It has lots of potential but needs work.

I love how this app is helping my kids stay connected with their friends during the shelter in place. I don't like that the tablet constantly rings when my young son is trying to take a turn playing on the tablet & there is no way to turn it off temporarily or put it on silent. When it has been ringing & you open the tablet the app automatically opens, I don't like that. You can set a sleep mode but "weekends" are Friday and Saturday & "weekdays" are Sun-Thurs, I need M-F after school hrs.

I like the app and all, but I wish video chat was full screen like regular video chats are. Also, instead of you having to take a picture as your profile, I wish you could just like put any photo in your gallery instead of having to take a picture of yourself or something. If you guys just edit these things, it would probably be the best messaging app for kids, and for me.

SO AMAZING! I CAN'T BELIEVE THAT YOU CAN CHAT WITH PEOPLE JUST BY ENTERING A CODE! Just enter a code and boom! You can now chat with another person! It's that easy! There is some ads but they never occur when you are chatting or typing! You can even see when someone sent a message just by CLICKING THE MESSAGE!!!!I rated this five stars for a reason! DOWNLOAD NOW!!!

Ehhh. It's not horrible and all but the thing that aggravates me is that you can't name people different names. Example: I want to name my friend '' bff '' but it won't let me only unless we're in a group with a bunch of people I'd really appreciate it if you fix that. Also, I'd like them to make it look more like fb messenger when you get on the main menu it just looks weird... and when you video chat people I wish you could see them with a full screen otherwise 5 star rating.

title: Skype - free IM & video calls
description:
Skype keeps the world talking. Say “hello” with an instant message, voice or video call – all for free*.

Use Skype to send SMS messages to mobiles worldwide and with SMS Connect you can now also read and reply to your phone's SMS messages right from your computer. SMS connect will be released gradually.

• Video calls – Don’t just hear the cheers, see them! Get together with 1 or 24 of your friends and family on a HD video call. Watch everyone’s smiles and cries when you tell them “We’re engaged!!!" 
• Chat – Reach people instantly. Send messages to your friends, grab someone’s attention with @ mentions, or create a group chat to plan a family reunion. 
• SMS Connect - Read and reply to your phone's SMS messages in Skype on your PC or Mac.
• Share – Send photos and videos with your family and friends. Save shared photos and videos to your camera roll. Share your screen to make travel plans with friends or present designs to your team.
• Voice calls – Camera shy? Make voice calls to anyone in the world on Skype. You can also call mobile and landlines at low rates.
• Express yourself – Liven up conversations with emoticons, click on the “+” in chat to send a Giphy or images from the web, and annotate images with words, lines and more.

By downloading the Skype Preview, you’ll gain early access to our newest and coolest features. Of course, while you’re having fun, know that this app is a work in progress. We're hoping to get your vital feedback as we add new enhancements and features to Skype. Simply click the heart icon on the main screen and you will be able to send your comments to our team, helping us shape the future of Skype.

Skype is available on phones, tablets, PCs and Macs.

*Skype to Skype calls are free. Operator data charges may apply. We recommend using an unlimited data plan or WiFi connection.

developerAddress: Skype Software S.à.r.l, 23 – 29 Rives de Clausen, L-2165 Luxembourg
recentChanges:
We're listening to your feedback and working hard to improve Skype. Here's what's new:
- Stability and reliability improvements.
comments: I accidentally created an account with my phone number, thinking I was adding it to my already-existing account. Unfortunately, that now means (according to Microsoft customer service) that my phone number can never be associated with my account, even if the accidentally-created account is deleted. One little mistake on my end that any other business would be able to fix now means that this app is less than useless for me. :/

This is a very bad application, I installed this application 5 month ago, they asked for a credit card information. I used if a few days and the App says the first month is free. After that few days I didn't use it anymore but they have charged me for 4 month. They didn't send any in-app notifications for charging or emails, despite the fact that they have already the email. On the other side , the settings is a complicated one and you can't find where to go for cancellation.

This is a great app, since I started using Android phone, I have used Skype since then and the best thing about it is video and audio are very clean, which gives good quality, I like it. By using its app and I will always be in touch with it and I hope that things will come up on the sky better and the process will work and on the sky is the very good app,

Terrible - This app does not work on my android tv box. Skype has downloaded but will not allow me to reach the sign in page. A pop up error message suggests checking my internet connection but there is nothing wrong with my WIFI or Ethernet connections. I guess I'm going to be even more socially distant from my family than planned.

They eat up the money you load after a while. They send you email saying if you do not log in, you will loose your credit. If you miss to log in, it totally disappear. There is no way of talking to someone or getting an email address to send message. You are going looptiloop for hours on their site and find no way to contact them.

title: Discord - Friends, Communities, & Gaming
description:
Discord is an all-in-one communication app for your communities, gaming, and friends. Chat and have fun in a custom server, where organized text channels and open voice channels make it easy to hop into a game together, plan your next meetup, or just keep in touch throughout the day.

A NEW WAY TO CHAT
• Organized channels give you plenty of room to share videos, coordinate meetups, or just talk about your day without clogging up a group chat.
• Open voice channels make hanging out easy. Grab a seat in a voice channel when you’re free, and friends can instantly jump in without having to call.
• Reliable, high quality communication wherever you go - seamlessly switch between Discord on mobile and desktop. 

HAVE FUN WITH TEXT, VOICE, AND VIDEO
• Wave hello over video, easily watch friends stream their games, or gather up for a screen-sharing session any time. 
• Turn any image into your own custom emojis, or express yourself with all the GIFs and reactions you need. 
• Share anything from a funny video to your latest group photos, and pin your favorites to remember later.

FOR COMMUNITIES OF 5 OR 500,000
• Custom permissions can group up your friends, organize your guild, or bring together community fans around the world. 
• Assign roles to members to give them moderation powers, or sort members into groups that you can message all at once with a single tag.
• Create VIP channels where admins, superfans, or any other special community members can chat in a place just for them.

Have questions or feedback? Email us at support@discordapp.com.

recentChanges:
** Improvements **
- Added some fancy new notifications for when you are receiving direct calls.
- The Nitro and Boosting screens got a fresh coat of paint.
🎵 Toss a coin to your discord server: You can now buy boosts!

** Bug Fixes **
- There were some issues with audio not coming out of bluetooth or wired headsets that should be addressed now. Let us know!
- You can control output volume again for each call participant by clicking on a user in a voice channel!
comments: I love discord, and use it every day. But the only complaint I have is the changes (currently) to the appearance on mobile. It doesn't entirely make sense? And it feels uncomfortable. Like swiping left to see the members in a group now has that overly large box. Likewise with servers. I'm aware you put the pins and such there, but why? There wasn't entirely a reason it seems, I've never seen anyone complain about it. It was easier to navigate without having a large box covering the chat.

I love this app on my phone and computer. Excellent for connecting with gamer friends!! I could go on and on about how much I use and love this app, but I just want to write my one compliant about it. My only issue with Discord is the infamous "robot voice" that people get occasionally. Besides that, excellent job Discord! Also, thank you for being free :)

Hello Discord, I don't really have any problems with it. Chat, call, make your own group chat or even video call. You can really do everything on Discord, but there is one thing that sticks out to me, that is... Friends list, it does it in a sort of, weird way, it puts group you've made and not in the groups list, but it's a good way to chat with friends.

I love it, really. There is a vast number servers to explore and join (you can make your own server/s too) and so many people to meet and/or make friends on there. The only issue that I had though, is that it wouldn't notify me at times when someone has messaged me, but other than that, my overall experience on this app has been great thus far😄😁

This app can be a masterpiece when it actually wants to, but honestly it seems like it doesn't even try. There's always some problems, either i can't hear other people or they can't hear me. Usually restarting the app does the trick, but not even that works anymore. Dissapointing. Please fix this, cause it could've been a 5 star rating.

title: Marco Polo - Stay In Touch
description:
Marco Polo combines the best of texting, social media and video chats - all in one private, easy to use app. 

IS IT SOCIAL MEDIA?
It’s different from typical social media apps because Marco Polo is real, trusted and built to be good for you. Unlike many apps, Marco Polo does not sell user data for advertising. Marco Polo isn't about likes or social comparisons. This is an app that parents actually want their family to use. 

SIMILAR TO VIDEO CALLS?
Marco Polo is vastly more practical. You never play phone tag and you don’t have to schedule blocks of time just to say hi. Marco Polo gives you tone, context and certainty that your message was heard.

CAN I TEXT MESSAGE?
Yes! Just like text messaging, you can communicate on your own time. Marco Polo is face-to-face, so you end up understanding each other better and feel much closer. And if you find yourself in a place where you can't use video, you can still send photos and texts on Marco Polo.

FULL LIFE, NOT FULL PHONE
With no limits on length, and video stored in the cloud, you have room for life. 

UNLIMITED POSSIBILITIES
You can talk to friends and family face-to-face even if they aren't iPhone users because Marco Polo works over WiFi anywhere in the world. No more time zone scheduling! 

PRIVATE
Marco Polo is designed to be for your closest friends and family. You can't search and find anyone without their mobile number. Marco Polo is also ad-free and we do not collect your data

MARCO POLO HAS THE FOLLOWING SUBSCRIPTION:

 Marco Polo - $9.99/Monthly $29.99/Annually

Terms of Use: http://www.getjoya.com/terms.html

summary: Marco Polo is a new way to stay in touch with the people who matter most to you.
recentChanges: Thanks for using Marco Polo! We update the app every week to provide a faster, more reliable experience. Turn on auto updates to make sure you always have the latest version.
comments: Looooove Marco Polo. Love the ease to use the software, whether you're techy or tech-averse. The only thing I would like would be different filters. I'm sure that makes things more complicated or more difficult, but I hardly use the current ones cause they're pretty basic (and kinda lame [sorry]). Other than that feature lacking, I would have given them a 5 star.

Love that I can connect with people I haven't seen in years!! I can watch the videos as they are talking to me or later. Really love that it reminds me if i have a message I haven't watched yet! Especially now its great for my kids to use to stay in touch with their cousins since traveling is a no go with covid-19.Haven't had any problems at all and been using it for 4 months now.

Actually love the concept, but it sent texts to people in my contacts, which I cant have happen. I have a lot of my customers and coworkers in there, so had to delete account. I get it's trying to spread its name, but I would have actually told people about it, if they didn't do that. Edit: The app developers worked with me to explain how to disable the contact permissions, but still be able to use the app. Thank you!

It is like having a fantastic conversation but on your own time. Even if your grandkids want to tell you something but you aren't available they can leave as long of a video conversation as they want and it is sent easily and quickly and can actually be watched and reacted to in REAL TIME! This simple app is a communication miracle !! So easy to use.. videos can be saved for later viewing or forwarded. LOVE IT!!!

60% of the time the record feature doesn't work, says something went wrong, so I send a problem report each time. I've uninstalled, reinstalled, updated my phone, the app, and still won't work when I try to record. I've taken these steps several times and have to restart my phone every time I want to send a message to someone. It's the most frustrating messaging app I've ever used.

title: TextNow: Free Texting & Calling App
description:
*NEW FEATURE* Now you can use TextNow without WiFi! Get unlimited calling and texting in the US over the Nationwide Sprint Network -- for FREE.  Check if your phone is eligible, and get phone service without the phone bill by clicking on "Free Coverage" in the app menu.

Local US or Canada Phone number
Give your friends your very own phone number they can call!

Unlimited Text & Picture Messaging 
You can send as many text messages as you want to US & Canada - FREE!

Unlimited Calling to USA and Canada 
Make unlimited free phone calls to any phone number in the US & Canada!

Cheap International Calling
TextNow offers low-cost, international calling to over 230 countries. Stay connected longer with rates starting at less than $0.01 per minute. Add money or earn free money by completing offers to your account and make low-cost international calls.

Features:
- Make and receive voice calls
- Emojis, stickers and gifs
- Full picture messaging : send, receive and save pictures!
- Video messaging: Send videos to your friends and family
- Voicemail Transcription: transcript of your voicemail
- Caller ID
- PassCode: keep your messages under lock and key
- Google SmartLock: no need to remember your password
- Call Forwarding
- Conference calling
- Signatures: add your own personalized signature to each text
- Customizable text-tone, ringtone & vibration
- Customizable backgrounds
- Assign individual contacts their own ringtone & background
- Quick Reply to easily (and quickly) respond to friends
- Home screen widget to launch TextNow, compose a new message or quickly make a call
- Unified inbox: send and receive your texts, SMS and GIFs directly via TextNow - use TextNow as your one-stop SMS texting app!
- One number, multiple devices – Send messages and make calls on your computer or tablet, then access them from your phone while on the go.
- TextNow.com - text from your computer too! All messages seamlessly synchronize with your mobile device.
- Turn your Wi-Fi enabled tablets into a phone.
- Elastic calling to protect you from dropped calls. Elastic calling is TextNow’s unique ability to have our calls choose the best possible route for your call to improve quality

Is it really free? 

There is no catch. No yearly or monthly fees! It is completely free! Download today and start sending and receiving your unlimited texts, pics, videos, and SMS messages.

How can all this be free?

The app comes with a few ads. If you don't like ads, you can purchase a subscription to remove them. Join the 100 million people who have already found a better way to talk & text free.

developerAddress:
Suite 200 - 420 Wes Graham Way
Waterloo, ON
N2L 0J6
Canada
recentChanges:
Fixed crash on app launch for a very small number of users
Various performance improvements
comments: I used this app and I quite like it. However, there are flaws, when a friend sends a picture, sometimes it loads or shows a no image picture. Today I had a problem to where I was getting nonfictions but they did not show up in app. Please fix, then I will have five stars. Otherwise, clean, good, and useful for the time being. I also seriously appreciate the dark mode. And I essentially use the calling, I love it. Another annoying thing is that I can only show 15 second videos. Otherwise good! :D

This is a great app. It REALLY does provide FREE long distance calling, WITHOUT having to earn credits! BUT, I have had THREE problems with this app; 1) Very often, I am not able to hang up, after dialing a number! 2) Quite often, after about two or three minues, the calls are cut off right in middle of my conversation! 3) There does not seem to be any technical support!

Great App. I moved from the city to the mountains and couldn't get dependable reception. I was suggested this app and tried it out. It works perfect. As long as you have a WIFI signal you will be able to call receive calls text and pic message. I like it so much that I've upgraded to the $2.99 a month and plan and use this as a perment means of communication now.

Meh, I had higher hopes for this app based on all the 5 star reviews, but was disappointed with my experience. Constant ads EVERYWHERE, sometimes multiple ads on one screen, and most of them take up half my screen, which is excessive, and beyond annoying. It frequently stalls on a solid black screen anytime I try to do anything, when u choose a contact it doesn't pick their default number, it picks the first number you added to that contact. Also, setting the background has never worked for me.

It's a decent free text & calling app, which works over WiFi or Mobile Data equally well. I've also upgraded to premium, which improves the app's versatility, but the free service is a complete product without requiring it to be premium, like a lot of other text & calling apps out there. So, that being said, I bet you're like, "He rated it 4☆ out of 5☆ though, what's the catch?" The 4☆ rating is cuz to keep the same cell# from changing you must text or call at least once every 3 days or...poof!

title: Google Duo - High Quality Video Calls
description:
Google Duo is the highest quality video calling app*. It’s simple, reliable, and works on smartphones, tablets, Google Nest, and on the web.



    Features:

    Group Calling
 Bring together all the people who matter most, even when you're apart, with group calling. Duo now supports up to 8 people in a group video call.

    Make Calls Between Android and iOS
 Whether you’re on your phone, tablet, or on the web, you can stay in touch with Duo.

    Low Light Mode
 Duo lets you make video calls even in poor lighting conditions.

    Video Messaging
 Short on time or your friends can’t pick up? Leave a personalized video message with fun effects.

    Voice Calling
 Make voice-only calls to your friends when you can’t chat over video.

    *Based on Signals Research Group technical study comparing video degradation time over 3G, LTE, and WiFi.

    **Data charges may apply. Check your carrier for details.

    ***Specific feature availability may vary based on device specifications.
descriptionHTML:
Google Duo is the highest quality video calling app*. It’s simple, reliable, and works on smartphones, tablets, Google Nest, and on the web.



Features:

Group Calling
Bring together all the people who matter most, even when you're apart, with group calling. Duo now supports up to 8 people in a group video call.

Make Calls Between Android and iOS
Whether you’re on your phone, tablet, or on the web, you can stay in touch with Duo.

Low Light Mode
Duo lets you make video calls even in poor lighting conditions.

Video Messaging
Short on time or your friends can’t pick up? Leave a personalized video message with fun effects.

Voice Calling
Make voice-only calls to your friends when you can’t chat over video.

*Based on Signals Research Group technical study comparing video degradation time over 3G, LTE, and WiFi.

**Data charges may apply. Check your carrier for details.

***Specific feature availability may vary based on device specifications.
summary: High quality video calling for Android & iOS phones, tablets, Google Nest & web.
recentChanges:
• Low light mode is now available on compatible devices to improve video call visibility in poor lighting conditions

• Make and receive Duo calls on Google Nest speakers

• Bug fixes and product improvements
comments: The video quality and cross platform support is great. With that said there are a few really annoying issues holding this back from a higher score as of the time writing this. 1) You can't seem to add/invite people to an ongoing call. You have to exit the call, create a new group with all people, and the call that group. Really?!? 2) If you have a group call going and it dwindles down to two people it cuts the screen in half for each user instead of full screen with the person you are talking with and small thumbnail for yourself. Fix these two issues and this will be a 5 star app.

I really want to like this app. It have good features, like the low light mode. It works great. But it lacks some fundamental features that it shouldn't. If i made a voice call, i couldn't req for a vid call immediately. I had to end call and call again. If i was in a vid call, i can't change to fon call, and i can't temporarily turn off the camera if i need to. If the other side ends the call, there is no tone to indicates the call was ended. Minor features, but fundamentally important.

I have Duo installed on my android and am attempting to use it on my computer once in a while. When someone calls, it rings on the phone but does not ring on the computer. There is no notification that someone is calling, nor is there any way that alerts me so I can press "answer" and pick up the call. I added duo into my notifications on the web browser as the HELP menu instructed with no luck. What do I do next?

Video seems to stutter & freeze much more than other apps like FB messenger or WhatsApp. This iccurs while communicating with others with good wifi at both ends. This forces us to move off Duo and into another app to communicate.

Latest version not working for outgoing calls on my Galaxy S20. Not sure what was done but tried reinstalling the app. Clearing my cache and even resetting my network settings. Whenever I call anyone it just says immediately "person didn't answer". It only pops up the incoming call on the other end for about 1 second. The only way is to have them call me back to chat. Very annoying for someone who uses duo everyday. Please fix this Google!

title: Google Voice
description:
Google Voice gives you a phone number for calling, text messaging, and voicemail. It works on smartphones and computers, and syncs across your devices so you can use the app in the office, at home, or on the go.
NOTE: Google Voice only works for personal Google Accounts in the US and G Suite accounts in select markets. Text messaging is not supported in all markets.
  You're in control
  Get spam filtered automatically and block numbers you don’t want to hear from. Manage your time with personalized settings for forwarding calls, text messages, and voicemail.
  Backed up and searchable
  Calls, text messages, and voicemails are stored and backed up to make it easy for you to search your history.
  Manage messages across devices
  Send and receive individual and group SMS messages from all your devices.
  Your voicemail, transcribed
  Google Voice provides advanced voicemail transcriptions that you can read in the app and/or have sent to your email.
  Save on international calling
  Make international calls at competitive rates without paying extra for international minutes with your mobile carrier.
  Keep in mind:
  • Google Voice is currently only available in the US. Google Voice for G Suite users is available in select countries. Check with your administrator for access.
  • Calls made using Google Voice for Android can be placed through a Google Voice access number. All access number based calls use the standard minutes from your cell phone plan and may incur costs (e.g. when traveling internationally).
descriptionHTML:
Google Voice gives you a phone number for calling, text messaging, and voicemail. It works on smartphones and computers, and syncs across your devices so you can use the app in the office, at home, or on the go.

summary: A customizable phone number in the cloud
recentChanges:
This release:
• Stability and performance improvements
comments: I have been using google voice for a few years now without ANY problems but all of a sudden it stopped working. I cant make/receive calls nor send/receive text messages. I have uninstalled three times in an effort to fix the problem but it's still not working. This is causing a huge disruption for me and there seems to be no technical support.

Usually great, but since the latest update, the notification on my lock screen (and thus also when I unlock) keeps disappearing. It'll show up for a few minutes, but if I don't get to it fast enough or if I don't see it right away, it just goes away. I keep needing to go into the app to make sure I haven't missed texts.

I really appreciate being able to have a second number that I can keep permanently for keeping my personal phone personal. I don't want everyone calling my cellphone; close friends, family etc yes! Business contacts, retail memberships, creditors, not at all. Nothing sucks more when trying to relax than some a-hole blowing up your phone. Got to love Google for this service! @ pthis price this service cannot be beat. Thanks Google Team!! Sincerely, Moe

Cant give it a 5... works great so far, definitely notifies me when I missed a call and it went to voicemail, but I want to either extend the number of "rings" before it goes to voicemail, OR disable the voicemail feature and review my missed calls! Either option would be good, and allow me the time to get to the phone to answer it! I am not so young that it is attached to my hand, and it seems to go to voicemail very quickly. Please advise on either option that I would like to utilize!

I've been using Google voice for a while now. I really enjoy having one phone number for everything. I'm not sure if I'm imagining this but it seems like I don't get very many spam calls to my number which is super nice. The search leaves something to be desired and the chrome plugin no longer works.

title: Hangouts
description:
Use Hangouts to keep in touch. Message contacts, start free video or voice calls, and hop on a conversation with one person or a group. 

 • Include all your contacts with group chats for up to 150 people.
 • Say more with status messages, photos, videos, maps, emoji, stickers, and animated GIFs.
 • Turn any conversation into a free group video call with up to 10 contacts.
 • Call any phone number in the world (and all calls to other Hangouts users are free!).
 • Connect your Google Voice account for phone calling, SMS texting, and voicemail integration.
 • Keep in touch with contacts across Android, iOS, and the web, and sync chats across all your devices.
 • Message contacts anytime, even if they’re offline.
 
 Notes: Mobile carrier and ISP charges may apply. Calls to Hangouts users are free, but other calls might be charged. View our calling rates at https://www.google.com/hangouts/rates
descriptionHTML:
Use Hangouts to keep in touch. Message contacts, start free video or voice calls, and hop on a conversation with one person or a group.

• Include all your contacts with group chats for up to 150 people.
• Say more with status messages, photos, videos, maps, emoji, stickers, and animated GIFs.

summary: Hangouts - free messaging, video, and voice
recentChanges:
• Bug fixes
• Android 8.0+ devices: Customized ring and chat message tones for individual classic Hangouts conversations and contacts will be removed. You can still customize general ring tones and messaging sounds for classic Hangouts by accessing Settings via the Menu section of the app.
comments: They are slowly killing this app. It used to work well, but functionality has been dying and I'm guessing it's a bit on purpose given that they have been trying to make other kinds of messaging apps. First, custom ringtones went away, now, there is no notification ringtone at all, just vibrate. It's sad as the functionality with desktop Gmail and the Google voice numbers just used to be great. There's less and less reason to use this.

The app works fine and is a great way for me to contact and call my friends. The only problem is that I don't know how to change the ringtone. At first the notifications only came in as vibrations. Then I changed the notification sound back to normal, but the ringtone would be the notification sound looped. Could someone help me figure out how to change the ringtone back to normal? Thank you.

I love this app for it's multi functionality, great all in one messaging app. It is too bad Google is not investing enough in Hangouts. Instead they went for some weird multiple single task apps like that Allo bs app none one is using anyways. Duo is not bad for video calls, but again the problem is that every one you want to contact and chat with must have all these messaging apps installed on there phones. And why the hell did they remove location sharing?

Just not the same. It wouldn't make the noise anymore when I got a text. I'd be missing texts, and texts not sending. Did an update on my phone which updated the app, and now the names of my contacts aren't associated with their phone numbers. I have group texts and i don't even know who's sending what text because it shows the number instead of the contact. Wish I didn't update it now. Would like to know who's sending me texts, not the number.

The latest update reset the ringtone from 'Hangouts Message' to 'App provided'. To restore 'Hangouts Message', go into Settings > [your account] > Notifications Messages > Advanced > Sound. Then use Media Storage to choose 'Hangouts Message' (or any other ringtone you want). NOTE: 'Settings' refers to settings within the Hangouts app, not the system settings.

title: Messenger Lite: Free Calls & Messages
description:
A fast and data-efficient messaging app to reach the people in your life. 

Messenger Lite:
- Installs quickly. It's less than 10MB to download!
- Saves data. It loads fast, runs efficiently and uses less mobile data.
- Works everywhere. Reach people when you're in an area with a slow or unstable internet connection.

With Messenger Lite, you can:
- Contact anyone on Messenger, Facebook or Facebook Lite.
- See when people are active and available to chat.
- Message people one-on-one or in groups to catch up or make plans.
- Send photos, links, or express yourself with stickers.
- Make one-on-one voice and video calls for free over Wi-Fi (otherwise standard data charges apply). Talk as long as you want, even with people in other countries!

summary: A faster version of Messenger that works in all network conditions
comments: 3/17/20: Now I can't view most pics & vid sent to me. I get the notif, but the message is blank. Now stickers are not working. This app gets worse with every update. ______________ As of last install, it logs me out automatically after EVERY use. No notifications. Tried all the usual tricks to no avail. ________________ *** This app: 6.4 MB. The official Messenger app: 42 MB. Which is great. But you can't add a comment or note when sharing an external link/photo. "Send" is your only option.

I gave three because at first when I used this app its very interesting how ever this afternoon when I open the app to check if there's a message but the app didnt work it always says unfortunately, messenger lite has stopped so I hope this issue will be fixed ASAP

Everything is okay.Much better and easier than messenger. But I've got some issues like i can't send a photo.I don't know if It happens only with me or not.And also the photo quality is the worst that we share in lite.It is so much Simple please add some more feature.

Oh how I can explain you that this is the awesome application for chat and also chat your gf also.... When I uses this app so i am getting excited for chat to my friends and that's time i am dieing to see my best frnd,,,,, that's why I gave this application 5 star ⭐ilove this app

Kinda confused since you see reactions to your messages but you can't make a reaction yourself. But when using the built in messenger in Facebook Lite, you can make and see reactions to your messages.

title: GroupMe
description:
GroupMe - the free, simple way to stay connected with those who matter most. 

Family. Roommates. Friends. Coworkers. Teams. Greek Life. Bands. Faith Groups. Events. Vacations. 


“Lifechanger.... utterly indispensable”
-Gizmodo


- START CHATTING 
Add anyone to a group via their phone number or email address. If they are new to GroupMe, they can start chatting over SMS immediately.

- CONTROL NOTIFICATIONS 
You’re in charge! Choose when and what type of notifications you receive. Mute specific chats, or the entire app – you can even leave or end group chats.

- SAY MORE THAN WORDS
Go ahead – fall in love with our exclusive emoji.

- THE WHOLE INTERNET IN YOUR GROUP 
Meme images, search and send GIFs, and see content shared from URLs displayed in the chat.

- SHARE NOW, RELIVE LATER
The gallery saves your memories. Easily explore the photos and videos shared in your group now, or later.

- LEAVE TEXTING BEHIND
With direct messages, you can use all the features you love for group chat, but one-on-one. It’s like texting, but better.

- CHAT WHEREVER YOU ARE 
Including from your computer at groupme.com


Whether separated by a hallway or a hemisphere, GroupMe allows you to stay in touch with the connections that count.  Get your group together. 


We want to hear your feedback!  
Email: support@groupme.com
Twitter: @GroupMe
Facebook: facebook.com/groupme
Instagram: @GroupMe

Love,
Team GroupMe



NOTE: SMS chat currently available in US only. Standard text messaging rates may apply.
Privacy Policy: https://groupme.com/privacy
A member of the Skype family

summary: GroupMe is the best way to chat with everyone you know.
developerAddress:
GroupMe
11 Times Square
9th Floor
New York, NY 10036
recentChanges:
The GroupMe team invites you to enjoy this update:

- Stabilize image upload failures
- Fix various crashes
- Allow chats to load on new install

As always, we love hearing what you think, so please consider leaving a review! For more information, visit our support page: https://groupme.com/help
comments: I really like the general idea of this app. Its super cool......when the notifications work. I've tried EVERYTHING. I make sure theyre on for the chat, theyre on for the app, and theyre on for my phone and they STILL dont work. I think its a common problem because Ive heard other people complain about it.....and it really bothers me. And like on top of no notifications, when I look at the chat, it acts as if Ive already looked at it. So thats a real bummer :((

I had multiple chat conversations disappear in November and they have remained missing ever since. I've tried numerous times to submit help tickets, but they either don't check their help desk or don't care, because all they can muster up is a note on their site saying "don't worry, this issue is fixed," when it's really not the case. Disappointing.

Pros: Like group texting, but only the gatherer needs your phone number. Profiles are maintained by participants, so icon and info are as complete as individual desires. Cons: Cannot delete conversations, only "mute," so there's muted spam forever in my list of conversations. Cannot mark messages as read from notification; must enter app and load conversation. New notification for every single post, so constantly, constantly dings (17 new posts in a conversation = 17 new notifications); would be nice if only notified that a conversation updated. Uploading images can be iffy; different rates of success by very same methods.

Great app for chatting with friends and connecting with peers that is cross platform. I often get a lot of bugs about messages not sending when they actually have, this problem has persisted across upgrading to a new phone, which lead to my 4 star rating. Small issue that is only a minor annoyance. Great app.

The app for months now has been just terrible. It took me about 2 months to get in contact with support. I eventually had to ask Skype support to somehow contact GroupMe and fix my issue. This was the best app for awhile but since Skype/Microsoft bought it it's slowly gotten worse and worse messages don't go through and glitches are constant. It used to be only happen on my end with Android but is starting to affect friends with iPhones as well now. It needs an overhaul to be a 5 star again

title: Yahoo Mail – Organized Email
description:
Thanks for checking out the Yahoo Mail app—the best email app to organize your Gmail, Microsoft Outlook, AOL, AT&T and Yahoo mailboxes. Whether you need a clutter-free mailbox, added customization, different views for deals, receipts, and attachments, or even more storage, we’ve got you covered. 

Favorite features:

Use any email address
Don’t make your other inboxes jelly. Add your Gmail, Outlook or AOL account and keep everything in one place. Custom settings, colors and notifications make it a breeze to keep your accounts separate.

Unsubscribe
Go forth and unsubscribe from the spam and junk mail you don’t want to see in your inbox. Yahoo Mail shows all the mailing lists you're subscribed to on one screen and makes it easy to opt-out in one tap.

 Attachments view	
Looking for that one doc from that one person? Or, a photo from brunch three Sundays ago? Don’t panic, It’s right here. See all of your photos and files attachments in one easy view.

Customization
Your inbox, your vibe. Customize the bottom nav bar with the folders and views you care about most. Then, pick custom sounds, themes, swipes to add your own flavor and unboring your inbox. 

Travel view
Travel stress-free. This view keeps all of your flight information in one organized spot. Smart Updates, from gate changes to delays and cancellations, will instantly appear in the app, so once you check in—you can check waaaaaay out.

Deals view
Expires today? Challenge accepted. See the deals from your inbox in one quick view or enable location permissions to see a map of deals near you and get notified in real-time as you walk into your favorite stores.

Groceries view
Win at groceries, every time. Add your grocery store loyalty cards to save coupons that will automatically get applied at checkout. To save even more, see all the deals in your area and save them to your shopping list.

People view
Only see emails from your favorite people. Ignore the robots.

Receipts view
No more crumpled receipts in your pocket. Find them neatly organized in your inbox. 

Sounds + notifications
Choose from several categories of notifications, custom sound alerts and visual settings—so, you get the reminders you need. And none you don’t.  

Accessibility
Features high contrast themes, dynamic text resizing, and optimized for use with VoiceOver screen readers. Plus, folders at the bottom of the Inbox allow assistive technology users to navigate with less effort.

1000 GB storage
You can’t see your whole world without room to roam. Download the app and you’ll never have to delete memories to get your mail again.

Yahoo Mail Pro
Get ad-free mail on Yahoo Mail for Android and priority customer support.

+	Available as an in-app purchase at $0.99/month or $9.99/year
+	Subscription will auto-renew each month or year within 24 hours of your renewal date
+	Manage or cancel your subscription via Account Settings

Terms of service: https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/terms/product-atos/comms-mailadfree/index.htm

Privacy policy: https://policies.yahoo.com/us/en/yahoo/privacy/products/mail/index.htm

summary: Now also works with Gmail, Outlook and AOL. No Yahoo email required!
recentChanges:
The coronavirus has become a pandemic, and Yahoo is working to ensure you have the latest information available at your fingertips.

This release includes 2 quick ways to access news on coronavirus:

• Look for a health icon at the top right of the inbox next to the Compose button. Tap this any time to access Yahoo News’ hub of information which includes fast facts, latest news, & more.
• Notifications: Get the latest developments and stories, curated by our editors at Yahoo News.
comments: Frustrating. I have been a Yahoo customer since we first got email. It used to work fine. That hasn't been true for years, especially with the mobile app. Why does is take a full minute or more just to delete one or move one email. Frequently, a message saying unable to complete function appears. If it does happen to work at first, the emails reappear in my Inbox. I really don't like it at all. But, I've had it for long it's be too disruptive to change all of my accounts.

While I use Yahoo mail a lot oh, I don't really understand the different versions of it. On my Android phone and my laptop with Windows 10, I use the app. It mostly gets the job done. But when I am taken to Yahoo mail from Craigslist for example, I'm replying to an ad, there's a version of Yahoo mail that is so much better. But I've never understood how to gain access 2 the Yahoo mail that has spell check built into it and graphically is much more rich and interesting.

This ap is seriously flawed. Frustrating. It doesn't respond as intended. All the features are there. For instance, delete more than one email. I deleted emails,only for them to reappear..and now unresponsive.it flashes an awful lot. As though it wants to respond.. It's not as smooth either, as outlook. The one thing I appreciate, is being able to select more than one email..using *one button. That's where it stops. Whatever action i want to preform, doesn't appear to work.

Very fast and organized for retrieval or back read. Before I had two alternating yahoo addresses. Strangely one was compromised. It had no messages to display in any folder. I uninstalled and reinstalled. Put back both. The second one is still compromised. Reinstalled and retained only the first one. Still satisfied. The other one I use yahoolite app but it's not as convenient.

I cannot get into my email account all of a sudden. It keeps telling me it's "initializing mailbox" and then it eventually says its currently unavailable, and try again later. I've been trying for 2 days. I've uninstalled and then installed the app again. It keeps doing the same thing. I tried to create a new password and its telling me, basically, that I tried too many times and to wait 24 hrs. I'm expecting important emails and now I'm locked out! OMG, I'm so frustrated!

title: Telegram
description:
Pure instant messaging — simple, fast, secure, and synced across all your devices. Over 200 million active users in four years.

FAST: Telegram is the fastest messaging app on the market, connecting people via a unique, distributed network of data centers around the globe.

SYNCED: You can access your messages from all your devices at once. Start typing on your phone and finish the message from your tablet or laptop. Never lose your data again.

UNLIMITED: You can send media and files, without any limits on their type and size. Your entire chat history will require no disk space on your device, and will be securely stored in the Telegram cloud for as long as you need it.

SECURE: We made it our mission to provide the best security combined with ease of use. Everything on Telegram, including chats, groups, media, etc. is encrypted using a combination of 256-bit symmetric AES encryption, 2048-bit RSA encryption, and Diffie–Hellman secure key exchange.

POWERFUL: You can create group chats for up to 200,000 members, share large videos, documents of any type (.DOC, .MP3, .ZIP, etc.), and even set up bots for specific tasks. It's the perfect tool for hosting online communities and coordinating teamwork.

RELIABLE: Built to deliver your messages in the minimum bytes possible, Telegram is the most reliable messaging system ever made. It works even on the weakest mobile connections. 

FUN: Telegram has powerful photo and video editing tools and an open sticker/GIF platform to cater to all your expressive needs.

SIMPLE: While providing an unprecedented array of features, we are taking great care to keep the interface clean. With its minimalist design, Telegram is lean and easy to use.

100% FREE & NO ADS: Telegram is free and will always be free. We are not going to sell ads or introduce subscription fees. 

PRIVATE: We take your privacy seriously and will never give third parties access to your data.

For those interested in maximum privacy, Telegram offers Secret Chats. Secret Chat messages can be programmed to self-destruct automatically from both participating devices. This way you can send all types of disappearing content — messages, photos, videos, and even files. Secret Chats use end-to-end encryption to ensure that a message can only be read by its intended recipient.

We keep expanding the boundaries of what you can do with a messaging app. Don’t wait years for older messengers to catch up with Telegram — join the revolution today.

summary: Telegram is a messaging app with a focus on speed and security.
developerAddress: Business Central Towers, Tower A, Office 1003/1004, P.O. Box 501919, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
recentChanges:
New Profiles, Fast Media Viewer and People Nearby 2.0

• Access shared media directly from the redesigned profile pages.
• Pull down to enlarge profile pictures.
• Flip through photos by tapping on their left or right edge.
• Tap on your chat partner's profile picture to immediately expand it.
• Make your profile visible to others in your area from 'Contacts' > 'Add People Nearby' and make new friends.
comments: Everything was fine until the recent update. This new "tap right/left to move between media" thing is really disturbing. Sometimes you just want to hide the text and for that you have to concentrate and make sure you tap on the middle of the screen. Also the fact that you can't view the account pictures in a full mode without the name, etc anymore is not good. Last but not least, I think there's some kind of glitchiness added to the app when navigating between pages. ببخشید که کُپ زدم😁

Probably the best messaging app in existence. You can easily edit a message, turn texts into italics or bold, or delete the messages you sent on both sides (not just what you see). Stickers are free, the usage of GIFs are made convenient, and you can easily send multiple pictures in one big group without giving the other side hundreds of notifications. This is completely free and you can even access it from the computer.

Very few times telegram works fine, but a lot of time, it keeps getting stuck at connecting. I am unable to view or open any new message in the app, even though I get the notification for new messages. When I click on notification, it opens telegram which is stuck on a connecting message on the top bar. I know its not due to my internet issue as I am able to browse internet in my browser at the same time. I tried to reinstall the app but it's now stuck on connecting on the phone registration.

Not working with WiFi Hi Team, Since yesterday, I've been having this issue where messages cannot be sent if mobile phone is connected to the Wi-Fi. It works fine when connected to the mobile data. It's a great app for messaging, but this issue is really annoying. Whenever it's connected to wi-fi, the app says "Connecting“ and I'm unable to send messages media. Multiple users have been facing this issue. It would be great if you could look into this issue and fix it asap.

Having trouble with the app, tried to get it to work but put the passcode in wrong too many times as keeps saying 'too many attempts please try again later'. I've tried waiting a day and coming back and it still says the same thing. Also having the same issue when uninstalling and reinstalling the app to try again.

title: Messages
description:
Meet Messages, Google's official app for texting (SMS, MMS) and chat (RCS). Message anyone from anywhere with the reliability of texting and the richness of chat. Stay in touch with friends and family, send group texts, and share your favorite pictures, GIFs, emoji, stickers, videos and audio messages.
Clean, intuitive, and comfortable design
Instant notifications, smart replies and a fresh new design make communicating faster and more fun. With dark mode, you can use Messages comfortably in low-light situations.
Easy sharing
Select or take pictures and videos directly from the app and share easily. You can even send audio messages to your contacts.
Richer conversations
Send audio messages, emoji, stickers, or your location. You can also send and receive payments with Google Pay.
Powerful search
Now you can find more of the content shared in your conversations: tap on the search icon and select a specific contact to see your messaging history with them and all the photos, videos, addresses or links you shared with each other.
Chat features (RCS)
On supported carriers, you can send and receive messages over Wi-Fi or your data network, see when friends are typing or when they have read your message, share images and videos in high quality, and more.
Messages is supported on devices running Android™ 5.0 Lollipop and above.

recentChanges: • Bug fixes and stability improvements.
comments: I have it and I use it, and I love it. However the only reason it's not my default messages app, is only because my samsung default app has "Quick Response". When I'm driving my taxi, it's nice that I can automatically send a message letting them know im not ignoring them... lol if you guys can get that on your app, I'd be in heaven. Great job tho, guys. It's a great app.

I got this app in order to send/receive texts over wifi. Unfortunately, even after tinkering with it for several hours and reading a lot of troubleshooting articles, I was not able to get this feature to work. Needless to say, I'm disappointed and a bit irritated about the wasted time; I'm now going to uninstall this app and go look for one that actually works.

Great app except it suddenly, without warning assigns default notification settings to every conversation, disregarding the global app settings. When I wipe the data and reconfigure anew it works great for awhile and then bam, all the conversations are back with default notification settings. I can't fix this without going into every conversation and changing the notification settings, one at a time, which is a big job. Thus, I can't use the app.

Only issues I have are this app doesn't light up my screen when I get a text message like the stock one does, and the lack of customization options. I mean really Google? You can't add a few more lines of code to give some options for bubble colors and backgrounds? And I missed a couple texts because I ignored my phone when it dinged because the screen didn't light up till I figured that out. Love the ability to text from my Chromebook though, and it's the only reason I'm keeping it for now.

I really like the functionality of the Google Messages app. However, a MAJOR shortcoming is the inability to automatically purge old messages either by message limit or by age. Since all messages are stored on your phone and not on Google's servers, ultimately the phone's memory use will become excessive - especially given the ability for Messages to send & receive large files and images with RCS. Short of deleting entire ongoing conversations with your contacts - which is rarely desirable - incredibly, there seems to be no other (easy) way to delete old messages except laboriously and manually! The omission of this basic function by Google is unthinkable! It's hard to imagine Google hasn't addressed this. Messaging apps with much less technical expertise and fewer resources than Google include an automatic purge function. Come on, Google, fix this!

title: Firefox Browser: fast, private & safe web browser
description:
Firefox Browser for Android is automatically private and incredibly fast. Thousands of online trackers are following you every day, collecting information about where you go online and slowing down your speed. Firefox blocks over 2000 of these trackers by default and there are ad blocker add-ons available if you want to customize your browser even more. With Firefox, you’ll get the security you deserve and the speed you need in a private, mobile browser. 

FAST. PRIVATE. SAFE.
Firefox is faster than ever and gives you a powerful web browser that protects your privacy. Keep what’s personal private with Enhanced Tracking Protection, which automatically blocks over 2000 online trackers from invading your privacy. With Firefox, you don’t have to dig in your privacy settings, everything is set up automatically, but if you like to be in control, you can choose from the many ad blocker add-ons available for the browser. We designed Firefox with smart browsing features that let you take your privacy, passwords, and bookmarks with you safely wherever you go.

ENHANCED TRACKING PROTECTION AND PRIVACY CONTROL
Firefox gives you greater privacy protection while you’re on the web. Block third-party cookies and unwanted ads that follow you around the web with Enhanced Tracking Protection. Search in Private Browsing mode and you won’t be traced or tracked — your private browsing history is automatically erased when you're done.

OWN YOUR LIFE WHEREVER YOU INTERNET
- Add Firefox across your devices for secure, private and seamless browsing. 
- Sync your devices to take your favorite bookmarks, saved logins and browsing history wherever you go. 
- Send open tabs between mobile and desktop.  
- Firefox makes password management easy by remembering your passwords across devices. 
- Take your internet life everywhere, knowing that your personal data is safe, never sold for profits.

SEARCH INTELLIGENTLY & GET THERE FASTER
- Firefox anticipates your needs and intuitively provides multiple suggested and previously-searched results across your favorite search engines. Every time.
- Easily access shortcuts to search providers including Wikipedia, Twitter and Amazon.

NEXT LEVEL PRIVACY
- Your privacy has been upgraded. Private Browsing with Tracking Protection blocks parts of Web pages that may track your browsing activity.

INTUITIVE VISUAL TABS
- Open as many tabs as you like without losing track of your open Web pages.

EASY ACCESS TO YOUR TOP SITES
- Spend your time reading your favorites sites instead of looking for them.

GET ADD-ONS FOR EVERYTHING
- Take control of your mobile browser by personalizing Firefox with add-ons like ad blockers, password and download managers and more. Want a more personalized browser? Add-ons can help you customize your browser to make your time online safer. 

QUICK SHARE
- The Firefox web browser makes it easy to share links to web pages or specific items on a page by connecting to your most recently used apps like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, WhatsApp, Skype and more.

TAKE IT TO THE BIG SCREEN
- Send video and Web content from your smartphone or tablet to any TV equipped with supported streaming capabilities.

Learn more about Firefox for Android:
- Have questions or need help? Visit https://support.mozilla.org/mobile
- Read about Firefox permissions: https://mzl.la/Permissions
- Follow Firefox on Twitter: https://mzl.la/FXTwitter

ABOUT MOZILLA
Mozilla exists to build the Internet as a public resource accessible to all because we believe open and free is better than closed and controlled. We build products like Firefox to promote choice and transparency and give people more control over their lives online. Learn more at https://www.mozilla.org

Privacy Policy: https://www.mozilla.org/legal/privacy/firefox.html

comments: Everyone should visit: ( BrowserGood. Com ) to install the best browser app. It's BLOCK ADS, PRIVACY and FAST. Firefox doesn't work. Works for maybe one or two sessions, then just won't respond to clicking on links, menu items, or even typing in addresses in the address bar. Tried with AND without extensions installed. Clearing storage is the only option to get it to work (temporarily) again

This Android browser is really fast and has an option al tracking protection which was made together with Disconnect. This is one of the things which make it worth using it over chrome. But if you use a privacy friendly search engine on chrome (Qwant, Ecosia, DuckDuckGo) you're already a long way to better privacy 🙉 👍🏼. Also I'm really EXCITED about Mozilla going to implement DNS-over-Https (DoH) which will stop prying eyes from corporate DNS servers. I will be waiting for that feature 🥰.

If you force stop an app, it may cause errors. Yeah basically accessing any site sometimes would have the browser stuck in loading until I force close it. Firefox is an old behemoth, I figure, and it's hard to squash all the bugs, but it's the browser I've stuck with for years. Keep up the good work, but really though, get the loading bug fixed, it's been like this for months.

What Happened??? Firefox used to be awesome. Man it just slowed my phone down and would freeze alot then wouldn't scroll. Appearance is nice until you realize there is no Dark (Night) Mode and no themes. I hope its just in the middle of Construction or something cause I have always been a fan but please get this browser back in the game asap!! Chrome needs some competition but seems to be no contenders.

I get random hangs and freezes on my OnePlus 7T. Sometimes, opening a link from an app will freeze the device for 10 seconds and Firefox fails to even launch. Even with no background apps this can still happen. I'm not really sure what's going on but I'm switching back to chrome for the time being.

title: Ring - Always Home
description:
Neighborhood security starts here.  Join millions of Americans and use the Ring app to get real time crime and safety alerts from your Neighbors.  It's a neighborhood watch for the digital age that creates a ring of security around your neighborhood.

Also, if you have Ring cameras, use the Ring app to watch over your home from your phone.
descriptionHTML:
Neighborhood security starts here. Join millions of Americans and use the Ring app to get real time crime and safety alerts from your Neighbors. It's a neighborhood watch for the digital age that creates a ring of security around your neighborhood.

Also, if you have Ring cameras, use the Ring app to watch over your home from your phone.
summary: See and speak with your visitors from anywhere in the world on your smartphone
recentChanges:
Enjoy a fresh new Ring app update, including bug fixes and improvements.

Your feedback helps us make the Ring app better for everyone. Send suggestions to help@ring.com
comments: Does a good job. Had a problem hooking it up. I bought a resistor and installed it everything works but by original door bell. Update 3/22/20: Still working pretty good. It's a little slow sometimes. I haven't figured out why yet. My Wi Fi connection is ok. Sometimes it doesn't tell me when someone is on my porch. But hopefully I will figure it out. Still worth the money so far.

It mostly works. There is a good delay even when I'm at home on my wifi. I can next to never catch a live view when I (used to) get notifications someone was outside. Even when they ring my doorbell I couldn't live view, it would just take forever to load. The past two weeks-ish I have also not been getting notifications. I wish there was an alert when battery was at 10% or less. I just don't check my emails enough to notice right away if it's low on battery.

Terrible app and experience. Since a week now, I haven't been receiving notifications on my phone, and if I do they come like 3 minutes later, which by then it's too late to even bother answering the door. The App has not been functioning. It freezes or at the logo screen, or after loading up the interface (without it even connecting to the camera). The camera also doesn't detect movement all the times which defeats the purpose of it. I've reinstalled the app 5 times already, without luck...

Never would be able to catch anyone in the act. Takes forever to load live video. Get a notification, click on it to view, then sit and wait for it to "activate device" and then load video. By that time, nothing is happening. Video also glitches every time. Video quality is okay, when it's working. Now I can't even view the live view. Starting to get ridiculous.

I've only had this thing for maybe 5 months now. It's getting worse and worse. It's not only seizing up the app from being able to see things live as they're happening, now it's freezing my entire phone to where I have to turn it off and back on to get it to keep working. I have Xfinity internet and a Samsung Galaxy 9 plus, so I don't believe it's my equipment. Smh. Making me want to find another doorbell company. This is very frustrating.

title: Contacts
description:
Back up your contacts and sync them across all  your devices
• Safely back up the contacts in your Google Account to the cloud
• Access the contacts in your Google Account from any device

Keep your contacts organized and up to date
• View your contacts by account (e.g., work vs. personal)
• Easily add contacts and edit information like phone numbers, emails, and photos
• Get suggestions for adding new contacts, cleaning up duplicates, and more

Contacts is currently only supported on devices running Android Marshmallow and above

recentChanges: • Bug fixes and stability improvements
comments: What I am the most disappointed in is that the ability to search contacts is now only restricted to within the contacts app. If used to be that we could start typing contact names in the Google search bar from the home screen, that was by far the most used search feature. This restriction really impedes the fluid use of the contacts app. Unfortunate.

I love Google contacts. I can block people that annoy me. I love that! I have options on who to save my contacts to. I always save my contacts to my Google Gmail account. That way I'll never loose those contacts. Google also keeps my contacts from previous phones Ive owned. I have the option to restore those contacts any time I need to.

Google contacts is a awesome app, through this app you can save your contacts on your Google account, and the a main thing I observed is if you save a contact on your Google contacts app is automatically save that particular number on the device memory.... This really helps a lot and thank you guys (GOOGLE) for creating such a great and useful app... I really appreciate your work.

Inconsistent. Seldom finds either of my two printers. One printer is connected through Wi-Fi while the other one is connected through hard wire to the same wireless access point. Neither printer is a problem when printing from other devices, but this app routinely tells me the printers are unavailable.

Buggy notes Section. I rely heavily on note taking for each contact. For years I have used the notes section. Until recently, it has worked flawlessly. Now whenever I tap on the Note section it jumps me down to the bottom. It makes it impossible to cut & paste things like account numbers from my notes to elsewhere. I can no longer do that. I have to copy the entire notes section. Further, taking notes is near impossible. I can't see when entering new notes at the top. More stars when fixed.

description:
Great news: Kik is here to stay! We'll have more to share soon but we're excited for what's ahead!

Get connected. 

Kik is way more than just messaging. It's the easiest way to connect with your friends, stay in the loop, and explore – all through chat. No phone numbers, just pick a username.

• Choose who to chat with one-on-one and in groups
• Share pics, videos, gifs, games, and more
• Meet new friends with similar interests

Get on Kik now. Start chatting!
